titles.title: BUILD for Veterans Act of 2022
BUILD for Veterans Act of 2022
Build, Utilize, Invest, Learn, and Deliver for Veterans Act of 2022

A bill to improve the management and performance of the capital asset programs of the Department of Veterans Affairs so as to better serve veterans, their families, caregivers, and survivors, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Build, Utilize, Invest, Learn, and Deliver for Veterans Act of 2022 or the BUILD for Veterans Act of 2022
This bill addresses Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) capital asset management, including by requiring the VA to ensure that each of its medical centers has a dedicated office and sufficient staff to conduct facility planning, long-range capital planning, and other relevant functions relating to VA capital assets.
